## WorkspaceLeaf.loadIfDeferred() method

If this view is currently deferred, load it and await that it has fully loaded.  1.7.2

**Signature:**

```typescript
loadIfDeferred(): Promise<void>;
```
**Returns:**

`Promise``<void>`
